May 2021

Evergreen v6.0.0

  • New 1
  • New 2


August 2020

Evergreen v5.0.0 is a general health check for the framework that focuses on developer experiences:

  • improving bundle size & performance
  • tree-shaking support (especially for icons)
  • better TypeScript definitions.

introductions.name: What is new
introductions.description: Evergreen is a living system, which means we are constently making updates to it. You can learn more about those changes and upcoming ones here.
